mapper.sql: SELECT o.id, o.number, o.user_id AS userId, o.address_book_id AS addressBookId, o.pay_method AS payMethod, o.pay_status AS payStatus, o.amount, o.remark, o.status, u.phone, u.name AS consignee, o.order_time AS orderTime, o.checkout_time AS checkoutTime, o.cancel_reason AS cancelReason, o.rejection_reason AS rejectionReason, o.cancel_time AS cancelTime, o.estimated_delivery_time AS estimatedDeliveryTime, o.delivery_status AS deliveryStatus, o.delivery_time AS deliveryTime, o.pack_amount AS packAmount, o.tableware_number AS tablewareNumber, o.tableware_status AS tablewareStatus, GROUP_CONCAT(od.dish_id SEPARATOR ',') AS orderDishes, CONCAT(ad.province_name, ' ', ad.city_name, ' ', ad.district_name, ' ', ad.detail) AS address FROM orders o LEFT JOIN `user` u ON u.openid = o.user_id LEFT JOIN order_detail od ON od.order_id = o.id LEFT JOIN address_book ad ON ad.id = o.address_book_id
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, dish_flavor as dishFlavor, dish_id as dishId, setmeal_id as setmealId, image, number, amount, order_id as orderId, store_id as storeId FROM order_detail WHERE order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT SUM(IF(status = #{acceptEd}, 1, 0)) as confirmed, SUM(IF(status = #{waitAccept}, 1, 0)) as waitingOrders, SUM(IF(status = #{delivering}, 1, 0)) as deliveredOrders,
SUM(IF(status = #{cancelled}, 1, 0)) as cancelledOrders, SUM(IF(status = #{completed}, 1, 0)) as completedOrders, SUM(IF(status is not null, 1, 0)) as allOrders FROM orders

select sum(amount) as turnover, avg(amount) as unitPrice, count(id) as validOrderCount, ( select count(distinct user_id) from orders where date(order_time) = curdate() and store_id = #{storeId} and user_id not in (select distinct user_id from orders where date(order_time) < curdate()) ) as newUsers from orders where store_id = #{storeId} and status not in (1, 6, 7)
select count(id) as finish from orders where store_id = #{store_id} and status =5
